Breadcrumbs

Breadcrumbs can help with navigation and hierarchy. By providing a running list of pages that were visited to allow a user to trace their navigation path, you can prevent confusion. The format simply takes an unordered list and formats it using a separator. The separator on the pseudo class may be overwritten.

Some studies would also suggest adding a back button to your page in addition to just breadcrumbs. See buttons for more info.

See the Pen Breadcrumb Styles by Kyle Logue (@kylelogue) on CodePen.0

Mustard UI was created to address the growing concern of CSS frameworks that look pretty bad. We took what we knew and liked about CSS and adapted it into a lightweight and production ready library.

Thanks for trying it out!
